cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP port for CU to 99999 exceeds the valid port range (0-65535), causing connection failures during F1 interface setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting the RA contention resolution timer to 100 exceeds the valid range (0-7), leading to improper RACH procedure handling and potential UE access failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 RA 爭用解析計時器設定為 100 超過有效範圍 (0-7)，導致 RACH 程序處理不當，並可能造成 UE 接入失敗。
